mapper.insert: insert into device_beetle_data (id, device_id, change_date, change_times, beetle_num, sample_alive, pine_death_num, epidemic_area) values (#{id}, #{deviceId}, #{changeDate}, #{changeTimes}, #{beetleNum}, #{sampleAlive}, #{pineDeathNum}, #{epidemicArea})
mapper.update:
update table where id = #{id}
device_id = #{deviceId},
change_date = #{changeDate},
change_times = #{changeTimes},
beetle_num = #{beetleNum},
sampleAlive = #{sampleAlive},
pineDeath_num = #{pineDeathNum},
epidemic_area = #{epidemicArea},
mapper.select: select sum(beetle_num) beetle_num, DATE_FORMAT(change_date, '%Y-%m-%d') change_date from device_beetle_data left join device on device_id=device.id where adcode = #{adcode} and town = #{town} group by DATE_FORMAT(change_date, '%Y-%m-%d') order by change_date asc
